ModMetaData.name: Humanoid Dryad
ModMetaData.author: gomi
ModMetaData.description:
This MOD is intended to be Just a bit upgrade for Dryad.
== CAUTION == This MOD requires "VanillaExpandedFramework" Dryad apparel requires "Animal Gear" -------------------------------------------------------- update version1.3.1
Texture change: - GauranlenTree related, Dryad petal (Old textures are stored in "OLD" folder in "ExTextures" folder.)
Dryad: - Disable voice (strictly) - Area can be specified and FilthRate: 0 - All types can draftable (deficiency: Unable to create healing pot) - Basic dryad: nuzzling/6.5h - Carrier dryad: Shorten Haul interval and Rescue possible - Gaumaker dryad: "Dryad stone" generation interval: 60days / Value: 2250 → 800
Add Item: "Animal Gear"(Mod) required! - D-Armor: Dryad basic armor (D-shirt) Making on "FabricationBench"
Add SurgeryRecipe: - Healing: Heals injuries completely / cost: "Dryad petal" x1
GauranlenTree: - Beauty: 6→80 - Mass: 150→50
【Note】 load data from version 1.2 or earlier, concern that the drawing of a dryad wearing clothes may be distorted. SOLUTION : Temporarily change the dryad's caste to another caste (respawn)
-------------------------------------------------------- update version1.2
Dryad Stone: Multiple complete treatments (4 sites)
Bug fixes: Fixed of production days for [Dryad petal], [Dryad Fruit], [Dryad Wool] would change when loading save data.
